function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infectious diseases in office spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementing effective workplace hygiene and sanitation protocols, promoting vaccination and regular testing, and enforcing social distancing measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection technology, smart sensors for monitoring occupancy and air quality","People":"Employees, visitors, and anyone who occupies the office space","Owner":"Employers, building management, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Anxiety and burnout among employees","Impact":"Decreased productivity, mental health issues, and reduced job satisfaction","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, fostering a supportive work environment, and implementing flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Mental health apps, telemedicine services, remote work tools","People":"Employees, human resources, and management","Owner":"Employers, HR departments, and mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of integration in design process for non-traditional building assets","Impact":"Inefficient or ineffective implementation of strategies to minimize disease transmission","Mitigation":"Early integration of disease prevention strategies in the design process, collaboration between architects, engineers, and public health experts","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM), virtual reality simulations, integrated design software","People":"Architects, engineers, public health experts, and building developers","Owner":"Building developers, architectural firms, and public health agencies"}]}
